attributes.action: PROTECT ELDERLIES IN HOSPITAL AT NIGHT
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Elderlies are vulnerable at night in hospitals. Something must be done to protect them. Why not installing cameras to make sure that nobody be able to abuse and ill treat them?

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
